SELECT SUM(ooso.red_packet_total) as "allRedPacketMoneyTotal" from o_oil_station_operator ooso INNER JOIN o_user ou on ou.id = ooso.uid INNER JOIN o_dic osp on osp.dic_code = ooso.operator and osp.dic_type="oilStationOperator" INNER JOIN o_dic rps on rps.dic_code = ooso.status and rps.dic_type="redPacketStatus" where ou.id = #{uid}

SELECT ooso.id as "id", ooso.uid as "uid", osp.dic_code as "operator", osp.dic_name as "operatorName", ooso.red_packet_total as "redPacketTotal", rps.dic_name as "statusName", rps.dic_code as "status", date_format(ooso.update_time, '%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s') as "createTime" from o_oil_station_operator ooso INNER JOIN o_user ou on ou.id = ooso.uid INNER JOIN o_dic osp on osp.dic_code = ooso.operator and osp.dic_type="oilStationOperator" INNER JOIN o_dic rps on rps.dic_code = ooso.status and rps.dic_type="redPacketStatus" where ou.id = #{uid} order by ooso.update_time DESC
